What are the treatments for Chediak-Higashi syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Chediak-Higashi syndrome:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Chediak-Higashi Syndrome  - Genetic Testing Registry: Chdiak-Higashi syndrome  - Immune Deficiency Foundation: Stem Cell and Gene Therapy  - International Patient Organisation for Primary Immunodeficiencies (IPOPI): Treatments for Primary Immunodeficiencies: A Guide
